Description: Fragment of the body of Clazomenian black figure painted pottery slim amphora. Tongues (dark, white, dark, purple): forehead of woman. Purple for fillet. White for flesh.
Producer name: Attributed to an Apprentice/Pupil of: The Petrie Painter
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 587, 3)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 131)
